author: donaldp
msg: Move BlockInvocationHandler code into BlockEntry rather than dealing with it in StartupPhase.
Use Applications new interface rather than the Container interface.
Use better naming conventions (block rather than object).
Move accessing the ConfigurationRepository into frame rather than accessing it directly.

author: donaldp
msg: Move Policy/ClassLoader/Classpath data outside frame (and into ClassLoaderManager).
Make Frame offer a simplified abstraction to ConfigurationRepository.
